articles.title: WATCH: How to buy plane tickets in the AI era
articles.summary: Delta is using artificial intelligence to help set some airfare prices. That has sparked fears that the airline, or any airline in the future, could create a custom price for you, using your data to find how much you would be willing to pay for a ticket.

articles.title: Meta picks Pimco, Blue Owl for $29 billion data center deal
articles.summary: Meta Platforms Inc. has selected Pacific Investment Management Co. and Blue Owl Capital Inc. to lead a $29 billion financing for its data center expansion in rural Louisiana as the race for artificial intelligence infrastructure heats up, according to people with knowledge of the matter.

articles.title: Why Tesla's latest move could be a boon for Nvidia, AMD
articles.summary: Tesla's move to shut down its Dojo supercomputer team likely increases its usage of general purpose GPUs for artificial intelligence, Wells Fargo said.

articles.title: AI Money Is Raining Down on Clean Tech Firms
articles.summary: Long-unloved nuclear and geothermal are experiencing a boom in interest as data center developers seek carbon-free resources capable of delivering round-the-clock electricity to power artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Wall Street and AI Startups Are Fighting Over Entry-Level Quants
articles.summary: At a rooftop bar on Manhattanâ€™s Lower East Side, roughly 150 quant researchers met with employees at the artificial-intelligence startup Anthropic who implored them to consider a life away from Wall Street.

articles.title: OpenAI releases GPT-5, free to users
articles.summary: Open AI announced Thursday the release of GPT-5, the latest and most-advanced iteration of its artificial intelligence technology, which will be free to users.
